title: My main account has been hacked
body:
My main account has been hacked and I tried to find the password but it won't send to any of my emails.
My sign id is --snip--
summoner name is -snipp-
I know i had about 7000 ip
Thank you

replies.body:
Hello Pete,

I am sorry you had your account get hacked and I understand this can be frustrating. I would recommend is that you change your password on the email account that is tied to your league account. I would also recommend you edit out of your OP your sign in-id as that's a security risk. 

Now on to the nitty gritty, from here on you need to contact Riot support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new ) and fill out a ticket under "I need help recovering my account" and in the subject line please put "Unrecoverable Account." From there, they will ask you questions to verify account ownership and temp ban the account. I hope this helps!
I tried recovery account... and doesn't work..

I've removed some info from your post as a security precaution.  Be extra careful about sharing your account info through public venues, and run through our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to make sure it's all safe and secure.  Don't worry, though, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so our account team can investigate this for you and help restore access.  We'll see you there!
Account recovery form won't do anything..
My account got hacked yesterday as well. Hope your experience gets cleaned up faster than mine is...
